author: Special Correspondent
text:
The representatives of the Kerala State United Nurses’ Association walked out of the meeting of the Industrial Relations Committee (IRC) and tendered their resignation from the committee on Tuesday, protesting against the alleged collusion between the government and various hospital management representatives.

UNA office-bearers Jasmin Shah and Beljoe Elias said that they had resigned from the IRC as the government had gone back on the assurances given to them.
title: Nurses’ forum members resign from IRC
